title: Our mission
mission: Empower engineering and security teams with actionable knowledge, versioned content and automation to react quickly to vulnerabilities.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Traceable content, official sources and accessible change history.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Workflows between developers, analysts and architects with shared context.

values.title: Technical excellence
values.description: Expert-curated practices aligned with OWASP, NIST and MITRE guidance.

team.title: Multidisciplinary team
team.description: AppSec specialists, platform engineers and red teamers contributing to a living ecosystem.
